text: We gave up some of our country to the white men, thinking that then we could have peace. We were mistaken. The white man would not let us alone.
author: Chief Joseph

text: War is only a cowardly escape from the problems of peace.
author: Thomas Mann

text: Democracy is necessary to peace and to undermining the forces of terrorism.
author: Benazir Bhutto

text: Peace comes when you talk to the guy you most hate. And that's where the courage of a leader comes, because when you sit down with your enemy, you as a leader must already have very considerable confidence from your own constituency.
author: Desmond Tutu

text: Democracies are indeed slow to make war, but once embarked upon a martial venture are equally slow to make peace and reluctant to make a tolerable, rather than a vindictive, peace.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr
